1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''AiProtection network security powered by Trend Micro,'' :''Parental Controls, Works with Amazon Alexa'' :Web GUI: http://router.asus.com "1246-01000238-50Z" is silkscreened on the main board. {{see also|ASUS MAP-AC1750|Edimax}} *[http://www.apkmirror.com/apk/asustek-computer-inc/asus-lyra/ ''ASUS Lyra app'' on '''APKMirror'''] :Android ASUS Lyra App v1.0.0.0.20 :Compatibility Models: :*[[ASUS Lyra]] ([[ASUS MAP-AC2200]]) :*[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] ([[ASUS MAP-AC1300]]) :*ASUS Lyra Trio ([[ASUS MAP-AC1750]]) :*[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] ([[ASUS MAP-AC3000]]) {{FCC ST|07/18/2018|indexme.}} *'''Banish WiFi Dead Zone''' - Dual band, tri-hub mesh wifi system with unique antenna :placement delivers strong WiFi to every corner of your home *'''Fast & Smooth Connections, Always''' - 3x3 MIMO technology and seamless roaming :deliver superior WiFi speed and connect you to best signal, anywhere in home *'''Always Up-to-date Protection''' - The lifetime free cloud-based security powered :by Trend Micro makes sure your privacy on connected devices is protected *'''Parental Controls''' - Website filters and scheduling allow you to protect your :family from inappropriate content and unhealthy Internet usage behavior *'''You’re in Control''' - The ASUS Lyra app enables PC-free setup, network :management and diagnostics, and notifies you about any problems ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33202-asus-lyra-trio-reviewed ''ASUS Lyra Trio Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/asus-lyra-trio-review ''ASUS Lyra Trio Reviewed'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] ===News=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family ''CES 2018 - ASUS Lyra Home Wi-Fi System'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://edgeup.asus.com/2018/lyra-voice-lyra-trio-bring-alexa-functionality-affordable-flexibility-to-your-mesh-network/ ''Lyra Voice and Lyra Trio'' on '''EdgeUp ASUS'''] ==Notes== ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info >> • |
############################################################################
# Qualcomm Atheros platform, linux-3.3.8
# SOC: QCA9557, QCA956X
# Qualcomm Atheros big-endian MIPS platform, linux-3.3.8

export MAP-AC1750 := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y SSH=y MIPS32=r2 QCA=y QCA956X=y 
 PARENTAL2=y OPENVPN=y VPNC=y EMAIL=y YANDEXDNS=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y EBTABLES=y 
 AUTODICT=y BUILD_NAME="MAP-AC1750" MAPAC1750=y NVRAM_64K=y TUNEK="n" 
 OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y DEBUGFS=y CFGSYNC=y 
 USB="USB" XHCI=y NOTIFICATION_CENTER=y WLCEVENTD=y \
	JFFS2=y WPSMULTIBAND=y ART2=y BLINK_LED=y \
	BT_CONN=y DETWAN=y SINGLE_SSID=y SSID_AMAPS=y \
	QCA_TW_AUTO_BAND4=y STAINFO=y JFFS2USERICON=y MESH=y \
	NATNL_AIHOME=y WIFICLONE=y QCA_VAP_LOCALMAC=y PSISTLOG=y 
        LYRA_HIDE=y DUAL_BACKHAUL=n
}} ==See also== *[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[ASUS Blue Cave]] - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Blue-Cave/ PPage] :128MB Flash, 512MB RAM, [[Intel]] Wi-Fi, IFTTT, IoT • [https://www.engadget.com/2017/05/29/asus-blue-cave-wireless-router/ Computex 2017] *[[ASUS Lyra]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) + QCA9886 (2T2R 5GHz) :*[[ASUS HiveSpot]] - ''AC2200 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] - ''AC1300 Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra-Mini/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 @717MHz Quad Core (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) :*[[ASUS HiveDot]] - ''AC1300 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *ASUS Lyra Trio - ''AC1750 Dual Band Mesh Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family CES 2018] *[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh Router with Smart Speaker'' [[Category:English Documentation]]
